data.name: Swiss Lightning Talks
data.description:
Hi, Swiss community! We are organizing Our first Lightning talks, short technical .NET development related talks of 10 to 15 minutes of duration.
Submit your paper today, Our intention is to execute the first session on July 28 during around 2-3 Hours (TBD). Dare submit your session and jump into …

relatedRecords.name: Launchpad 2020
relatedRecords.description: Join us at Launchpad 2020, our inaugural conference! We’re excited to show you several groundbreaking products that will greatly accelerate your journey to modern apps. During the event you’ll see new products and learn from your peers and technology experts.
